text: The Democratic Janata Dal is a political party in Jammu and Kashmir. DJD had merged with the Jammu & Kashmir National Conference in 1998, but on 3 February 1999 DJD was revived as a separate party. The party president is Ghulam Qadir Wani and the general secretary is Yograj Singh. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Political parties in Jammu and Kashmir Category:Political parties in India
title: Democratic Janata Dal (Jammu and Kashmir)
